title: A Man After God's Own Heart: Devoting Your Life to What Really Matters
description: At last—a powerful companion volume to A Woman After God’s Own Heart® by Elizabeth George (400,000 copies sold). Many Christian men want to be a man after God’s own heart...but how do they become one? Author Jim George shows that a heartfelt desire to grow spiritually is all that’s needed. God’s grace does the rest—bringing lasting change to a man’ Marriage —leading, loving, and protecting his wife God’s way Work —cultivating attitudes and actions that make a difference Witness —putting God on display in his life and words This book will help men realize the tremendous joy and confidence that comes from pursuing God in every area of their lives.
author: Jim George
